entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HOT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S

data.HIGHS: SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
